Package zork

Class ActionHandler

java.lang.Object
zork.ActionHandler
public class ActionHandler extends Object
Class to handle more complex commands like use item with item or feed animal
Version:
25.08.2021
Author:
Patrick Mayer

    • useWith

      public <T extends NonItem> String useWith​(Item item, T nonItem, Game game)
      Method to implement specific constellations of items and Non-Item (and extended classes) to do specific things
      Parameters:
      item - the item which should be used
      nonItem - the Non-Item which should be used
      game - to change data of player and rooms
      Returns:
      String

    • useWith

      Method to implement specific constellations of items and item of the inventory to do specific things
      Parameters:
      item - the item which should be used
      secondItem - the second item which should be used
      game - to change data of player and rooms
      Returns:
      String

    • feedWith

      public String feedWith​(Animal animal, String food, Game game)
      Method feed to feed animals with necessary item and then call method action after fed
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal, which should be fed
      food - Name of the item, which is the food
      game - to change data of player and rooms
      Returns:
      String

    • eat

      public String eat​(String foodName, Player player, boolean isFood)
      Method to eat food as a player
      Parameters:
      foodName - name of the item, which is the food
      player - the current player to get the inventory and other information
      Returns:
      String

    • useRucksack

      public String useRucksack​(Item rucksack, Game game)
      When item rucksack is used the players inventory size will be increased by the rucksacks strength, rucksack gets removed from current room
      Parameters:
      rucksack - Given item the player wants to use
      game - Is given to manipulate game data
      Returns:
      String

    • releaseContainedItems

      private <T extends NonItem> void releaseContainedItems​(String item, T nonItem, Room room)
      Adds all contained items of the NonItem (or extended classes) to the room and removes NonItem from room if state is removable
      Parameters:
      item - The item that is necessary to manipulate the NonItem
      nonItem - The nonItem that will be manipulated
      room - The room where this is happening

    • removeNonItemFromRoom

      private <T extends NonItem> void removeNonItemFromRoom​(T nonItem, Room room)
      Remove NonItem from its list depending on which class it belongs to
      Parameters:
      nonItem - The NonItem that should be removed from room
      room - The room where the nonItem should be removed

    • feedShark

      private String feedShark​(Animal shark, String fish, Game game)

      Parameters:
      shark - The animal, which is fed
      fish - The food the player gave the animal
      game - To change data of player and rooms
      Returns:
      String

      Parameters:
      crocodile - The animal, which is fed
      meat - The food the player gave the animal

    • useSpearWithCoconutPalm

      private String useSpearWithCoconutPalm​(Item spear, NonItem coconutPalm, Room room)
      Throw spear at coconut palm to get item coconut, will only work every third time the player tries this
      Parameters:
      spear - The item the player is using
      coconutPalm - The nonItem the spear is used with
      room - Is given to manipulate the current room
      Returns:
      String

    • useMacheteWithThornyBush

      private String useMacheteWithThornyBush​(Item machete, NonItem thornyBush, Game game)
      When the thorny bush gets cut down, this direction of both ways (beach/jungle or jungle/beach) is free, it moves to the other beach/jungle connection and blocks the way the other direction, same happens with the crocodile
      Parameters:
      machete - The item the player is using
      thornyBush - The nonItem the machete is used with
      game - Is given to manipulate game data
      Returns:
      String

    • useFishingRodWithFishSwarm

      private String useFishingRodWithFishSwarm​(Item fishingRod, NonItem fishSwarm, Room room)

      fishSwarm - The nonItem the item is used with

      Returns:
      String

    • useNoteWithSuitcase

      private String useNoteWithSuitcase​(Item note, NonItem closedSuitcase, Game game)
      When item note gets used with nonItem suitcase, the suitcase gets opened and releases its items, also the rucksack to increase the size of players inventory
      Parameters:
      note - The item the player is using
      closedSuitcase - The nonItem the item is used with
      game - Is given to manipulate game data
      Returns:
      String

      Returns:
      String output

    • fightEnemyWithMachete

      private String fightEnemyWithMachete​(Game game) throws InterruptedException
      Method generates random number between 1 and 3 and selects if the player has to block, do a critical strike or just attack.
      Parameters:
      game - the game to manipulate player
      Returns:
      String
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - of the sleep function

    • criticalStrike

      public String criticalStrike​(String input, Game game)
      Method to hit a critical strike (You have to type space as fast as possible) Damage 2*strength of weapon
      Parameters:
      input - the user input
      game - the game to manipulate
      Returns:
      String

    • block

      public String block​(String input, Game game)
      Method to block an attack (Player has to type block as fast as possible) Damage to player 20
      Parameters:
      input - the user input
      game - the game to manipulate
      Returns:
      String

      public String attack​(Game game)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
